courseDetails.title: Gratitude
courseDetails.shortDescription: The life transforming power of Gratitude
courseDetails.longDescription:
Gratitude, the attitude that sometimes seem counter-intuitive, especially when we look around and find no reason to engage in it.

It is defined as the quality of being thankful; readiness to show appreciation for and to return kindness.

Beyond that, it is a quality or trait that you can express by reflection, self and for the people, things and circumstances around you.

It has a few powerful side effects. Some include:

- A change in perspective

- Uplifting ones mood

- Creating a suitable environment, at least within ones mind, that facilitates good decision making   


Gratitude for what, many ask?

Gratitude for Health, Sleep, Food, Body, Mind, Wellbeing, Peace of Mind, Finances, a job, career, income, roof over ones head, ability to earn, appreciate the way the world works and make a living out of it.

Gratitude for interactions, relationships with those around us, our families, children, parents, friends, colleagues, associates.

Gratitude for our professional situations, abilities, opportunities, overcoming challenges and much more.


To build this perspective into ones life is a gift one should bestow on ones self. It helps open up new perspectives at all times.

It also has immense benefits for your health - mentally, physically, emotionally. IT helps with better sleep, better self esteem, improved moods and much more.


The opportunities we have in this one life will be amplified and optimised by a quality such as Gratitude in our lives.


Gratitude to people also help forge better relations. It does not mean we should cease to have our own minds or always defer to what the people we are grateful to want, but it should be demonstrated genuinely, from the heart at every deserving opportunity. It is a privilege to have others support, care and help us.

We ourselves would do well to seek out people to support, care for and help. Not in search of gratitude or having them in our debt, but to show how grateful we are for the things that have come our way, without expecting anything from anyone in return.


Lastly, Gratitude to who?


Whoever you decide or However or Whatever you decide to show Gratitude to in your own way.


Thanks for stopping over on this course and I hope it will contribute to your life in some way.


I am grateful for the privilege to be able to reach you.


Please, remember to reach out and or leave a feedback.


Best regards,

Baba
targetAudiences: Everyone
Students
Professionals
Managers
Leaders
Decision Makers
Adults
Young People

courseDetails.title: SMART Goals Parenting
courseDetails.shortDescription: 5 Skills to Parenting Healthier and Easier. Bye-Bye Power Struggles!
courseDetails.longDescription:
Many parents describe the desires for their children as "I want my kids to be happy" or "I want them to have a good life." But these goals are abstract and difficult to achieve once, let alone repeat.


SMART Goals Parenting breaks these (and other) abstract desires down into their basic foundational components that allow you and your child to achieve happiness, connection, trust and respect... repeatedly.


SMART Goals Parenting's objective is to provide you with the knowledge and tools to cultivate your desired relationship with your child while also preparing your child for being able to one day cultivate happiness and success for him/herself.

You will learn the two SMART goals, which will be your guiding lights are you traverse the terrain of parenthood.


As long as you maintain your focus on what you are ultimately trying to achieve you won't get lost in the minutia.

After learning the SMART goals you will learn how to identify and avoid the pitfalls of choosing fear over love and discarding self-care.


Engaging in these two behaviors will sabotage all of your work. It will be like pouring water into a bottle with no bottom. If you have ever felt unappreciated, unloved, disrespected or criticized for your parenting efforts then I am certain one or both of these barriers are at play.

The next few lessons will tackle guidance.


My goal is to get you to the point when guiding your child is a simple conversation in which both of you feel understood and respected. Until then, you may need these skills to help you navigate.


Choices, Consequences, Rewards and Reinforce (CCRR) are the four parts of seamless discipline.


Streamline how you discipline and remove all power struggles. Doing so will solidify you as your child's respected figure and someone s/he can look up to.


The last, but not least topics covered are the most used parts of communication - listening and speaking. You should listen to understand and speak to build trust.


Many Parents, Myself included have practiced these, eliminating Parenting Stress, following Structured Guidance, helping to Raise Healthy, Confident and Motivated Children.


I look forward to helping you do the same.


Best regards,

Helen V Hicks MA MBA LPC

Licensed Professional Counselor, Parenting Coach
targetAudiences: Parents or caregivers of children aged 1 to 17 years old

courseDetails.title: Microsoft Excel Comprehensive Guide

courseDetails.title: AI-Powered Data & Product Masterclass
courseDetails.shortDescription: Leverage AI for data-driven product development, market launch, growth, and compelling data storytelling
courseDetails.longDescription:
Are you ready to unlock the transformative power of Artificial Intelligence to revolutionize product development, drive unparalleled growth, and become an indispensable leader in tomorrow's market?

The future of business is data-driven and AI-powered. In today's rapidly evolving landscape, simply managing products isn't enough. You need to innovate, analyze, strategize, and communicate with the agility and insight that only cutting-edge AI tools can provide. This AI-Powered Data & Product Masterclass is your comprehensive blueprint to mastering these essential skills.


Master AI for Product & Data Excellence

This isn't just another course on AI. This is a meticulously crafted bundle that brings together the core pillars of modern product success: data analysis, product development, and the game-changing capabilities of Artificial Intelligence. You'll move beyond theory and gain practical, hands-on experience leveraging tools like ChatGPT, Google Gemini, and Microsoft Copilot to supercharge your workflow and decision-making.

In this masterclass, you will:

  • Strategize & Validate: Use AI to conduct rapid market research, identify untapped opportunities, and validate product ideas with unprecedented speed and accuracy.

  • Accelerate Product Development: Harness AI as your co-pilot for ideation, requirements gathering, prototyping concepts, and building robust product roadmaps.

  • Optimize Marketing & Growth: Apply data analysis techniques and AI-driven insights to craft compelling marketing campaigns, analyze performance, and drive user acquisition and retention.

  • Drive Data-Driven Decisions: Go beyond intuition by using analytical frameworks and AI-powered tools to make informed choices that directly impact your product's success and profitability.

  • Transform Insights into Influence: Master the art of data storytelling, turning complex analyses into clear, persuasive narratives that captivate stakeholders and drive action.

  • Future-Proof Your Career: Equip yourself with the most in-demand skills at the intersection of AI, data, and product, positioning yourself as a visionary leader in your industry.


Why this Course is Different – Your Blueprint for AI-Powered Success

This masterclass stands apart by offering a unique blend of strategic thinking and practical application, specifically designed for the AI-first world:

  • Holistic Integration: Unlike standalone courses, we seamlessly integrate AI tools across the entire product lifecycle – from initial data analysis to market launch and post-launch optimization. You won't just learn AI; you'll learn how to apply AI strategically.

  • Hands-On Learning: With dedicated 'Labs' (Jupyter Notebook environments), you'll practice using AI tools and data analysis techniques directly within the course, ensuring you build real-world proficiency.

  • Comprehensive Coverage: This bundle brings together five powerful courses, ensuring you get a complete education:

    • Data Analyst: Professional Certificate in Data Analysis: Build your foundational data skills, including advanced Excel with AI integration.

    • ChatGPT for Product Management & Innovation: Dive deep into using generative AI for every stage of product development.

    • Master Product Development: From Idea to Market Success: Understand the full product lifecycle and strategic go-to-market planning.

    • Expert Certificate: Marketing Data Analysis & Data Analytics: Learn to measure, analyze, and optimize your product's market performance.

    • Data Storytelling: Communicating Data Insights Effectively: Turn your insights into impactful narratives that influence decisions.

  • Expert Instruction: Learn from an instructor with real-world experience in both data analysis and product leadership, guiding you through practical scenarios and best practices.


We'll start by fortifying your data analysis foundations, ensuring you're comfortable with data collection, cleaning, exploration, and statistical analysis. You'll even learn how to leverage AI-powered features in Excel like Gemini and Copilot to make your daily data tasks smarter and faster.

Then, we transition directly into ChatGPT for Product Management & Innovation. This is where you'll discover how AI becomes your indispensable co-pilot. You'll learn to conduct competitive analysis, understand target audiences, brainstorm new product ideas, develop detailed specifications, and even automate documentation – all with the assistance of generative AI. You'll craft compelling prompts to unlock AI's full potential in market research, ideation, and roadmap generation.

Next, you'll gain a robust understanding of the Master Product Development lifecycle, from Idea to Market Success. This course provides the strategic backbone, covering concept development, design, prototyping, testing, and comprehensive go-to-market strategies. You'll learn about Agile methodologies, Scrum, and PMP principles to manage your product journey effectively, complementing your AI knowledge with industry-standard practices.

To truly drive monetization, you'll master Marketing Data Analysis & Data Analytics. This crucial component teaches you how to analyze market data, track key performance indicators (KPIs), understand customer behavior, and optimize your marketing campaigns using data-driven insights. You'll learn how to measure the real impact of your product launches and iterative improvements.

Finally, because insights are only powerful if they're understood, you'll master Data Storytelling: Communicating Data Insights Effectively. This course will teach you how to design compelling visuals, craft engaging narratives, and effectively present your AI-driven analyses and product visions to any audience, ensuring your ideas drive action and secure buy-in.

By the end of this masterclass, you won't just be proficient in individual tools; you'll understand how to synergize data, AI, and product strategy to create a powerful engine for innovation and revenue. You'll be ready to lead digital transformation, make smarter decisions, and build products that truly resonate in the market.

courseDetails.title: SAP SAC & BW4HANA Training + SAC Cert Prep Test
courseDetails.shortDescription: Master SAP Analytics Cloud (SAC) & BW/4HANA with real projects. Includes SAC certification practice test prep.
courseDetails.longDescription:
SAP Analytics Cloud (SAC) is a cloud-based business intelligence tool used for data visualization, planning, and predictive analytics. It's designed for business users to make data-driven decisions in real-time using intuitive dashboards and reports.

SAP BW/4HANA, on the other hand, is a data warehousing solution built on the SAP HANA platform. It’s used to model, store, and manage large volumes of enterprise data from multiple sources, acting as a centralized backend for reporting tools like SAC.


SAP Analytics Cloud (SAC)

Welcome to the ultimate SAP Analytics Cloud (SAC) course – a practical and comprehensive guide designed for beginners, business users, and technical professionals who want to learn how to use SAC effectively.

In this course, you will start with the fundamentals – what is SAP Analytics Cloud, its powerful features, and different connection types. You’ll understand the difference between Import and Live Connections, and how to use various data sources to build insightful models.

We’ll dive deep into modeling in SAC using sample datasets, dimension tables, and types of data models – enabling you to create accurate and efficient analytics structures.

You will learn how to design stories with various visual elements like charts, widgets, geo maps, and use conditional formatting to enhance your reports. You will explore different story types, layout options, and interactive features.

The course also covers Planning in SAC including planning phases, planning models, and how to enable predictive planning for future insights – making it a well-rounded package for both analytics and planning needs.

Whether you're working in SAP BI, finance, HR, or operations, this course will help you utilize SAC to make data-driven decisions and create professional dashboards.

Join now to master one of the fastest-growing tools in the SAP ecosystem.


SAP BW/4HANA

Unlock the full potential of enterprise data with SAP BW/4HANA, SAP’s next-generation data warehousing solution. This comprehensive course is designed to help you master the concepts, architecture, modeling, and data management capabilities of SAP BW/4HANA — whether you're transitioning from traditional SAP BW or starting fresh.

You will learn how BW/4HANA leverages the power of the HANA in-memory platform to deliver real-time data processing, simplified data models, and advanced analytics capabilities. Through hands-on exercises and real-world use cases, you'll understand key components such as Info Objects, Composite Providers, ADSOs, Open ODS Views.


Whether you're a data engineer, BI consultant, or SAP professional, this course gives you the technical depth and practical insights needed to succeed in SAP BW/4HANA environments.

Prepare to build enterprise-grade data warehousing solutions and support next-gen analytics with SAP BW/4HANA!

courseDetails.title: How to Make Smarter Decisions and Stop Making Foolish Ones
courseDetails.shortDescription: The way to making smarter, better, and more profitable choices in business and in life.
courseDetails.longDescription:
We make tens of thousand of decisions every day. Admittedly, a lot of those decisions are not critical. But some decisions can make the difference between success and failure, profits and losses, and even life and death.

We have to be honest with ourselves that most major decisions involve a tradeoff. That raises an interesting question about decision making: what’s your tolerance for risk? What are you willing to give up to get something important?

Are you willing to make decisions based on objective data, facts, an accurate analysis and not emotions?

Here’s more about what you’ll learn in this course:

—The power of feelings in decision making.

—The need for instant gratification will lead us to make poor choices.

—Indecision is a decision. But is it the right one?

—Assumptions can be the enemy of smart decisions.

—Know your blind spots.

—Be aware of the law of unintended consequences.

Our goal in this course is to suggest ways that we can make smarter, better informed, wiser, more profitable decisions, and reduce the number of bad, self-destructive, not clearly thought out choices. We want to reduce those times when we’ve said to ourselves: “What was I thinking?”

I hope you’ll decide to watch this course and learn how to make more impactful, sharper, and beneficial decisions for every aspect of your life and your business.
targetAudiences: This is for anyone who wants to make better business choices
How to avoid the traps of bad decision making

courseDetails.title: Centro de Evaluación: Planificación y Ejecución [ES+]

courseDetails.longDescription:
Dominio del Assessment Center: Diseño, Ejecución y Evaluación del Talento


Descripción del curso


El Assessment Center (Centro de Evaluación) es uno de los métodos más eficaces para evaluar a empleados y candidatos según sus competencias, potencial y adecuación al puesto. Utilizado por líderes del sector como SHL, Korn Ferry, Aon, Hogan Assessments y DDI, este enfoque permite tomar decisiones de talento basadas en datos.


Este curso ofrece una guía completa para diseñar, implementar y gestionar un Assessment Center, desde el análisis del puesto y la evaluación de competencias hasta la gestión de interesados y los informes posteriores a la evaluación. Ya seas profesional de RR. HH., reclutador o consultor, obtendrás herramientas prácticas para realizar evaluaciones de alto impacto alineadas con marcos como PMQ, DISC, OPQ32, Watson-Glaser, Hogan y otros enfoques basados en competencias.


Lo que aprenderás:


  • Comprender los fundamentos del Assessment Center: objetivo, validez y estructura.

  • Desarrollar ejercicios de evaluación y modelos de competencias utilizados por SHL, Hogan y Korn Ferry.

  • Dominar el análisis del rol y el mapeo de competencias para evaluaciones precisas.

  • Formar y gestionar evaluadores para garantizar la coherencia y fiabilidad.

  • Realizar evaluaciones conductuales y entrevistas estructuradas para medir habilidades y liderazgo.

  • Utilizar herramientas como pruebas psicométricas, juicios situacionales, estudios de caso y role plays.

  • Gestionar la retroalimentación posterior a la evaluación y planificar el desarrollo del talento.

  • Aplicar los resultados en reclutamiento, desarrollo de liderazgo y planificación de sucesión.


¿A quién va dirigido este curso?


• Profesionales de RR. HH. y responsables de adquisición de talento — Para usar Assessment Centers en selección, promoción y evaluación de talento.

• Reclutadores y especialistas en selección — Para aplicar técnicas conductuales en la detección de talento.

• Especialistas en L&D — Para diseñar formación y desarrollo de liderazgo basados en competencias.

• Consultores y facilitadores de Assessment Centers — Para estructurar y dirigir evaluaciones efectivas.

• Expertos en Desarrollo Organizacional y Gestión del Desempeño — Para aplicar evaluaciones en engagement y planificación del personal.

• Psicólogos y especialistas en ciencias del comportamiento — Para usar evaluaciones de personalidad, pruebas cognitivas y simulaciones.

• Entusiastas del HR Tech e IA — Para explorar herramientas de evaluación digital y virtual con IA.


Estructura y módulos del curso:


Este programa consta de seis clases detalladas que cubren todo el ciclo del Assessment Center, desde la planificación hasta la ejecución e informes.


Clase 1: ¿Qué es un Assessment Center?

Clase 5: Ejecución del Assessment Center

¿Por qué elegir este curso?

दुनिया निरंतर परिवर्तन की स्थिति में है, और इसके साथ ही जोखिम परिदृश्य भी लगातार विकसित हो रहा है। नए जोखिम उभरते हैं, मौजूदा जोखिम विकसित होते हैं और वैश्विक प्रणालियों की परस्पर जुड़ाव का मतलब है, कि जोखिम जल्दी से फैल सकते हैं और बढ़ सकते हैं। संगठनों को इन उभरते जोखिमों और रुझानों की पहचान करने और प्रतिक्रिया देने के लिए सतर्क रहना होगा ताकि वे अपनी Resilience बनाए रख सकें और अपने Goals प्राप्त कर सकें।

Course Authors:

1. Dr. Alex Amoroso एक अनुभवी प्रोफेशनल हैं, जिनका शैक्षणिक और उद्योग क्षेत्र में समृद्ध अनुभव है। वे शोध विधियों (Research Methodologies), रणनीति निर्माण (Strategy Formulation) और उत्पाद विकास (Product Development) में विशेषज्ञ हैं। उन्होंने School of Social Sciences and Politics, Lisbon, Portugal से डॉक्टरेट की डिग्री प्राप्त की है, जहाँ उन्हें उनकी उत्कृष्ट शोध के लिए विशेष सम्मान और डिस्टिंक्शन से नवाज़ा गया।

डॉक्टरेट की पढ़ाई के साथ-साथ, Ms. Amoroso ने एक आमंत्रित शिक्षिका (Invited Teacher) के रूप में भी कार्य किया है, जहाँ उन्होंने अंडरग्रेजुएट से लेकर प्रोफेशनल और एग्जीक्यूटिव कोर्सेज के बिज़नेस स्टूडेंट्स तक को पढ़ाया है। वर्तमान में, वे EIMT, Zurich, Switzerland में डॉक्टोरल छात्रों को पढ़ा रही हैं, जहाँ वे शोध डिज़ाइन (Research Design) और मेथडोलॉजीज़ (Methodologies) पर एडवांस्ड इंस्ट्रक्शन देती हैं। साथ ही, MTF Institute में वे Product Development के अकादमिक डोमेन की प्रमुख हैं।

शैक्षणिक और व्यावसायिक अनुभवों के समन्वय से, Ms. Amoroso ने अपने व्यवसायिक करियर में शानदार उपलब्धियाँ हासिल की हैं। उन्होंने विभिन्न कंपनियों में R&D गतिविधियाँ, उत्पाद विकास, रणनीतिक योजना, और बाज़ार विश्लेषण (Market Analysis) का नेतृत्व किया है। उन्होंने बैंकिंग और फाइनेंस, PropTech, कंसल्टिंग और रिसर्च, और इनोवेटिव स्टार्टअप्स जैसे क्षेत्रों में बेहतरीन बाज़ार प्रथाओं को लागू किया है।

Alex Amoroso की वैज्ञानिक उपलब्धियों में अनेक शोध पत्रों का प्रकाशन शामिल है, जो प्रतिष्ठित जर्नल्स में प्रकाशित हुए हैं। इसके साथ ही उन्होंने कई अंतरराष्ट्रीय सम्मेलनों में मौखिक प्रस्तुतियाँ और पोस्टर्स के माध्यम से अपने शोध कार्य प्रस्तुत किए हैं। उनके शोध निष्कर्षों को School of Political and Social Sciences और Stressed Out Conference at UCL जैसी प्रतिष्ठित संस्थाओं में प्रस्तुत किया जा चुका है।

अंतरविषयी सहयोग (Interdisciplinary Collaboration) के प्रति गहरी रुचि और सकारात्मक परिवर्तन लाने की प्रतिबद्धता के साथ, Alex Amoroso समर्पित हैं शिक्षार्थियों और प्रोफेशनल्स को ऐसी एडवांस मेथडोलॉजीज़ सिखाने में, जो उन्हें वैश्विक व्यवसायिक जगत में उत्कृष्टता (Excellence in Global Business World) प्राप्त करने में सक्षम बनाती हैं।


2. Dr. Shréyasee K., ThD एक स्वतंत्र व्याख्याता (Independent Lecturer) और कोर्स की सह-लेखिका (Course Co-author) हैं।

2025 तक, शैक्षणिक रूप से, उन्होंने Theology (धर्मशास्त्र) में डॉक्टरेट की डिग्री  (ThD) प्राप्त की है , और साथ ही वे Integrative Healing में मास्टर डिप्लोमा धारक हैं।

पेशेवर रूप से, वे पहले एक पुरस्कार-विजेता  कला विशेषज्ञ रही हैं। उन्हें उनके 2015 से 2022 के बीच के समग्र रचनात्मक कार्यों के लिए, h.c.Dr. (Honoris Causa) की उपाधि प्रदान की गई थी।

वह समय-समय पर इनोवेशन (Innovation), क्रिएटिविटी (Creativity), अप्लाइड मनोविज्ञान (Applied Psychology), आध्यात्मिकता (Spirituality) और लीडरशिप (Leadership), जैसे क्षेत्रों में अपने नॉलेज बेस को अपडेट करने के लिए सक्रिय रूप से प्रयासरत रहती हैं।

courseDetails.longDescription:
Master the 360-Degree Feedback Process and Become the Expert Your Organization Needs


Imagine trying to improve employee performance without truly understanding how your team members behave, collaborate, and lead. Annual reviews and KPIs can tell you what was achieved — but not how. That’s where 360-degree assessments come in — a powerful method for gathering feedback from peers, managers, and direct reports to uncover hidden strengths and development areas.


This comprehensive online course equips you with the skills and tools to design, implement, and lead professional 360-degree feedback projects from scratch — no consultants required.


Whether you’re conducting a leadership review, preparing succession plans, launching a performance improvement initiative, or simply building a culture of feedback — this course gives you everything you need.


Here’s what we cover:


  • The fundamentals of 360-degree feedback: benefits, myths, risks, and strategic use cases

  • Questionnaire design: competencies, behaviors, open-ended questions, rating scales

  • Writing communication templates to improve response rates and reduce bias

  • How to run 1:1 and group feedback sessions

  • Linking 360 assessments to leadership development, employee growth, and HR strategy

  • Free and paid automation tools: Google Forms, enterprise platforms, reporting tools

  • Case studies from real companies using 360° to fuel engagement and performance



You’ll also receive plug-and-play templates, sample forms, and best practices collected from 5000+ HR professionals across industries.


Led by Mike Pritula, a globally recognized HR expert with 140+ courses and 15+ years of practical experience, this course is your fast track to HR mastery.

courseDetails.title: Competency Skill Model Development Approach and Library [EN]
courseDetails.shortDescription: HAY | Hogan | Lominger | Library | Model | Skills | Hard | Soft | Competency | HR | Assessment | Framework | Assessment
courseDetails.longDescription:
How do the best companies consistently select, develop, and retain top talent? The secret often lies in a robust competency model—an essential HR foundation that drives hiring, development, performance, succession, and even compensation.


This course is your step-by-step blueprint to building and applying a powerful competency framework in your organization. Whether you’ve heard of HAY, Hogan, Lominger, or just started exploring, you’ll learn how to move beyond theory and apply proven models to real HR processes.


You won’t just learn what competencies are—you’ll build them. From identifying key behaviors, to developing profiles, to conducting assessments and linking them to culture and strategy. By the end of this course, you’ll have your own ready-to-use competency model backed by global best practices and templates.


We’ll dive into:


• The difference between soft and hard skills—and why most companies assess them wrong

• The most effective sources for competency data

• Conducting interviews using Critical Incident and Functional Analysis methods

You’ll explore how different evaluation systems work, when to use each, how to avoid bias, and how to align employee assessments with company goals. We also cover legal and ethical considerations, documentation practices, and how to turn evaluation data into development plans.


Whether you’re launching a new evaluation process or fixing a broken one, this course gives you a structured roadmap.

courseDetails.title: Quantity Surveying for G+11 High-Rise Buildings Estimation
courseDetails.shortDescription: G+11 Building Estimation & Quantity Take-Offs (Practical Case Study), with rate analysis
courseDetails.longDescription:
Quantity Surveying is one of the most in-demand skills in the construction industry, and this course is designed to give you complete practical training with a real G+11 multistory building project. Unlike other courses that focus only on theory, here you will learn by doing- step by step, from drawings to BOQ, estimation, and billing.


We begin with the fundamentals of Quantity Surveying, Estimation, and Costing in high-rise buildings. You will learn how to read architectural and structural drawings, extract quantities, and calculate materials required for each stage of construction including earthwork, foundations, columns, beams, slabs, walls, plaster, flooring, and finishing works.


The course also covers Bar Bending Schedule (BBS) preparation with real reinforcement examples, and Rate Analysis for major construction items such as RCC, steel, masonry, plaster, and finishing. You will gain hands-on skills to prepare a Bill of Quantities (BOQ) in Excel, perform cost estimation, and manage tendering, contracts, and billing


processes.


In addition, you will learn the professional methods of cost control, valuation, and variation orders used in real projects. The entire course is structured around a case study of a G+11 multistory building, ensuring that every concept is applied practically.


By the end of this course, you will be able to confidently prepare estimates, BBS, BOQ, rate analysis, and final billing for multistory projects-skills that make you job-ready for roles such as Quantity Surveyor, Billing Engineer, or Cost Estimator in the construction industry.


This course is ideal for civil engineering students, fresh graduates, site engineers, and professionals who want to upgrade their knowledge with real project-based training.
targetAudiences: Civil Engineering students who want to gain practical knowledge beyond theory.
Quantity Surveying students looking for real project-based training.
Anyone interested in learning practical quantity surveying through a G+11 multistory building case study.

courseDetails.longDescription:
You’re one step away from joining the ranks of certified HR professionals recognized around the world. The PHR™ (Professional in Human Resources) certification by HRCI® is more than a credential — it’s a career accelerator. And this course is your ultimate companion to passing the exam with confidence.


Whether you’re an HR generalist, recruiter, coordinator, or business partner, you already know the value of strong HR skills. But passing the PHR exam requires more than work experience — it demands strategy, exam-specific insight, and practice. That’s exactly what this course delivers.


Over 10 comprehensive modules, you’ll master every section of the PHR™ Exam Content Outline, including:


  • Talent planning and acquisition

  • Employee and labor relations

  • Compensation and total rewards

  • Learning and development

  • Business and HR strategy

  • Compliance, risk, and operations



You’ll also gain exclusive access to time-tested test-taking strategies — like the Process of Elimination (POE), scenario question decoding, and pacing tips that make the difference between passing and failing.


But this isn’t just about passing the test.


You’ll also learn how to leverage your PHR credential to ask for a raise, step into a bigger role, and build a personal HR brand that stands out. We’ll cover how to prepare for recertification, showcase your badge on LinkedIn, and plan your next move (SPHR? GPHR? SHRM-CP? You decide).


Don’t just study — certify.

Don’t just take notes — take the lead.

Don’t just hope to pass — prepare to win.


By the end of this course, you won’t just feel ready — you’ll be strategically ready.

courseDetails.title: CHRO: Become a Strategic Chief Human Resources Officer [EN]

courseDetails.longDescription:
You’ve made it to the top of the HR function — but you know there’s a ceiling unless you can speak the language of business. Sitting at the executive table is no longer enough. The question is: can you influence strategy, challenge the CEO, and guide the board using data, not instinct?


This course is not another HR certification. It’s your personal roadmap to becoming the kind of CHRO that top companies want — and keep. You’ll gain tools, models, and board-level thinking used by the world’s best HR executives from companies like Microsoft, Johnson & Johnson, and GE.


Whether you’re preparing to step into the CHRO role or want to redefine your leadership presence, this course arms you with a practical, world-class framework for transforming HR from a support function into a business growth engine.


You’ll get immediate access to recorded sessions, homework for your own practice, case studies, downloadable tools, and a community of senior HR professionals from around the globe.


Course Program

Transitioning from HR Director to Strategic CHRO

Session 1. CHRO 2.0: How to go beyond HRD and become a company strategist

  • Understand the World-Class CHRO model

  • Learn the difference between CHRO and HRD

  • Communicate in the language of the board


Financial Alignment and Strategic Compensation

  • Build HR strategies that align with business objectives

  • Learn the metrics CEOs actually care about

  • Design compensation that makes sense to investors


Talent Architecture and Succession Planning

Session 3. EVP, retaining key players, and leadership succession

  • Create an EVP that attracts and retains

  • Build a leadership pipeline for critical roles

  • Master strategic workforce planning


Culture and DEI as Business Drivers

Session 4. Culture, engagement, purpose, and DEI

  • Use culture as a strategic advantage

  • Drive engagement in hybrid and distributed teams

  • Implement DEI with measurable ROI


Leading Enterprise Transformation

Session 5. Fearless transformation and the CHRO as a change leade

  • Lead change, manage resistance, and build resilience

  • Develop agile, future-ready organizations


HR Analytics and Executive Influence

Session 6. The power of data and board-level stakeholder management

  • Use HR analytics for executive decision-making

  • Align internal and external stakeholder expectations


The CHRO of the Future

  • Coach and influence the CEO and top team

  • Navigate AI, ESG, and future-of-work challenges


From your first session, you’ll feel like you’re in the boardroom. You won’t just learn — you’ll practice and apply your new skills in homework assignments personally reviewed by the course author. You’ll work with real-world tools, checklists, and executive-level frameworks. You’ll engage in a private Telegram community with fellow strategic HR leaders worldwide.


This course has already helped hundreds of HR directors make the leap to CHRO. Will you be the next?

courseDetails.title: Recrutamento com IA: Automatize e Otimize Contratações [PT+]

courseDetails.longDescription:
Curso “IA em Recrutamento e Sourcing” [PT]


O curso “IA em Recrutamento e Sourcing” da Mike Pritula Academy foi desenvolvido para capacitar profissionais de RH, recrutadores e sourcers com conhecimentos e habilidades para integrar efetivamente a inteligência artificial aos seus processos de recrutamento. Ao utilizar ferramentas de IA, os participantes poderão aumentar a eficiência, atrair candidatos de alta qualidade e manter uma vantagem competitiva no cenário de aquisição de talentos.


O que você vai aprender:

• Oportunidades e Tendências de IA no Recrutamento e Sourcing: Compreenda o papel da inteligência artificial no recrutamento moderno, incluindo as tendências, inovações e estudos de caso bem-sucedidos.

• Otimização de Textos e Imagens de Vagas com IA: Aprenda como a IA auxilia na criação e aperfeiçoamento de descrições de vagas, análise de atratividade e geração automática de imagens otimizadas.

• Seleção Automatizada de Candidatos: Descubra como a IA melhora o processo de busca e seleção, com ferramentas e algoritmos de correspondência automática e integração com ATS.

• Automação do Sourcing e Comunicação com Candidatos: Explore ferramentas de IA para automação do sourcing, mensagens personalizadas e aumento do engajamento.

• Avaliação de Candidatos e Análise de Entrevistas: Entenda como aplicar IA na avaliação de competências, transcrição e análise objetiva de entrevistas.

• Fortalecimento do Employer Branding e Marketing de Recrutamento: Aprenda como a IA aprimora a marca empregadora, melhora a interação com candidatos e automatiza campanhas de marketing de recrutamento.


Programa do Curso:


  1. Oportunidades e Tendências de IA no Recrutamento e Sourcing:

    • Introdução à IA no recrutamento moderno

    • Tendências e inovações mais recentes

    • Exemplos de uso bem-sucedido

    • Riscos e desafios

    • Previsões futuras

  2. Textos e Imagens para Vagas com IA:

    • Criação e otimização de descrições de vagas com IA

    • Análise de atratividade de anúncios

    • Geração automática de imagens para vagas

    • Ferramentas e exemplos práticos

    • Boas práticas

  3. Seleção Automatizada de Candidatos:

    • Como a IA aprimora a busca de talentos

    • Ferramentas e algoritmos de correspondência automática

    • Integração com ATS

    • Casos práticos e estratégias eficazes

  4. Automação de Sourcing e Comunicação:

    • Ferramentas de IA para automação do sourcing

    • Plugins para comunicação com candidatos

    • Sequências automatizadas de e-mails

    • Exemplos de mensagens eficazes e personalizadas

  5. Avaliação e Entrevistas com IA:

    • Avaliação de competências com IA

    • Condução e análise de entrevistas com IA

    • Transcrição automática

    • Avaliação objetiva e redução de vieses

  6. Employer Branding e Marketing de Recrutamento com IA:

    • Formação e fortalecimento da marca empregadora

    • Análise e melhoria das interações com candidatos

    • Automação do marketing de recrutamento

    • Exemplos de campanhas bem-sucedidas

    • Planejamento e mensuração da eficácia


Diferenciais do Curso:

• Instrutor Especialista: Aprenda com Mike Pritula, especialista em RH com ampla experiência na aplicação de IA em recrutamento.

• Aprendizado Flexível: Seis aulas gravadas que você pode assistir no seu ritmo.

• Aplicação Prática: Tarefas com feedback personalizado.

• Comunidade Interativa: Acesso ao chat exclusivo para dúvidas e troca de experiências.

• Certificação: Diploma após a conclusão para fortalecer seu currículo profissional.


Para quem é este curso:

• Recrutadores e Sourcers: Profissionais que desejam se atualizar com IA no recrutamento.

• Especialistas de RH: Quem busca aumentar a eficiência na atração de talentos.

• Gestores de Aquisição de Talentos: Líderes que querem modernizar processos e fortalecer sua marca empregadora com IA.


Ao dominar as aplicações de IA em recrutamento e sourcing, você poderá acelerar contratações, atrair os melhores talentos e se destacar no mercado. Inscreva-se agora e transforme sua abordagem de recrutamento!

Este curso inclui o uso de inteligência artificial. Ele garante insights de ponta e as práticas mais recentes.

Este curso inclui uma promoção.
targetAudiences: Este curso é destinado a recrutadores, profissionais de RH, especialistas em aquisição de talentos e gerentes de contratação que desejam integrar a IA ao seu processo de recrutamento. Também é ideal para empresários, fundadores de startups e qualquer pessoa interessada em aproveitar as ferramentas de IA para automatizar e otimizar estratégias de contratação. Seja você um recrutador iniciante ou experiente, este curso o ajudará a se manter à frente no mundo em evolução do recrutamento impulsionado pela IA.
